MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G46 postcode area of Giffnock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.46am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by 3rd party damage to an underground cable outside 1 Belmont Drive. We now need to carry out an emergency shutdown for additional customers at 12.04pm. This may affect the supply to your property. Due to the repairs required we will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.08pm on the 2nd of March 2021.
